name: Fast Foundry, LLC
description:
Fast Foundry is a solutions company delivering quality Business Applications and Services while adding value clients at realistic and affordable prices. This approach allows us to provide reliable real world solutions to meet present needs, saleable to address the future demands of clients from startups and small businesses to mid-sized to enterprise class organizations. We deliver excellence in terms of dedicated business – centric solutions.
We are specialists in customized, simple to use systems that integrate with your business and existing systems. We believe your applications and information should be available anywhere and everywhere your people are doing business. Our team of skilled professionals have experiences working in a variety of business segments. Cross-industry experiences provide us the ability to understand clients’ business as well as technology requirements. A unique blend of experts with proven track records, web designers, network engineers, software developers, graphic designers, project managers and software testers makes it possible to offer our clients affordable web and business solutions that are both innovative and influential. Services include: • Consulting & Planning Services: Business Requirements Evaluation; Strategic Website Evaluation; Technical Architecture Planning; Content and Application Analysis; Usability Testing. • Design & Development Services: User Interface Design; Wireframe and Templates; Creative Graphic Design; Content Management; System Architecture Design; Video Delivery Systems. • Web Application Development Services: Custom Business Applications; Custom Application Integration; Social Media; Mobile Device Applications; E-Commerce Applications; Training & Knowledge Transfer Applications. • Innovation & Dreaming: Innovative Discussion; Brainstorming; Technology Consulting; "Outside the Box" Innovation.
